data_filter package

Submodules

data_filter.data_analysis module

data_filter.data_analysis.avg_measurement(sensor: int)[source]
data_filter.data_analysis.highest_measurement(sensor: int)[source]

Function takes sensor ID and print out highest value saved in database. :param sensor: :return: str

data_filter.data_analysis.lowest_measurement(sensor: int)[source]

Function takes sensor ID and print out the highest value saved in database. :param sensor: :return: str

data_filter.data_analysis.plot_values(sensor_id: int)[source]

Plots the values measured by sensor of a sensor with a linear regression line.

Retrieves the sensor measured data from the database and filters them. Function plots calculated regression on a scatter plot of measured parameter values in time.

Parameters:

sensor_id – The ID of the sensor.

Returns:

None

data_filter.localize module

data_filter.localize.get_coords(descritpion)[source]
data_filter.localize.show_stations_on_map()[source]

Function retrieves data from the database and displays them on map.

Function transforms stations data fetched from SQLite database into a pandas dataframe. Folium library is used to create an interactive map of Poland. Function adds markers on the map according to geolocation data and opens a map saved in HTML file in default web browser.

Returns:

None

data_filter.localize.stations_in_city()[source]

Asks the user for a city name and prints a list of stations in that city.

This function asks user to enter a city name and then retrieves a list of stations in that city from the database. It filters the stations based on the provided city name and prints the names of the stations.

Returns:

None

data_filter.localize.stations_in_range(user_place: str, range: int)[source]

Function takes description of user location (City, street) / (place name e.g. “Uniwersytet Adama Mickiewicza”) and prints a list of stations in given range (50km by default).

User_place:

A description of localization given by user

Range:

Search radius in km

Returns:

Station in given radius list
